comments:
Feacal ecoli count per 100ml is 160 this is above the government threshold of 50/100ml, it is suggested that this borehole is chlorinated.
All other water quality indicators tested are within government standards.

The water sampled has a Total Hardness of 476mg/l  this value is very high, although there are no known health effects from consuming very hard water it can cause other issues such as more soap required for washing laundry, scales on kettles and scales on boilers.
The Water quality is within Government standards.
Water quality is within Government standards.
